discussion.p: Force the literal type requirement for the const_iterator in the std::basic_string_view so that iterators of std::basic_string_view could be used in constexpr functions.

resolution.p: This wording is relative to N4640.

li.p: Add to the end of the section:

blockquote.p:
-1- In every specialization basic_string_view<charT, traits>, the type traits shall satisfy the character traits requirements (21.2), and the type traits::char_type shall name the same type as charT.
-?- All the operations on const_iterator required to satisfy random access category are usable in constant expressions.
